resources.string: Unable to connect to the server
Delete the HTML file (Can\'t be undone!)
The page is not a TiddlyWiki.
Are you sure you want to delete this version?
Are you sure you want to remove this Wiki from Tiddloid?
The wiki is no longer available. Do you want to remove it?
Do you want to restore to the previous backup? A backup of the current version will be generated.
Unsaved changes detected. Are you sure you want to quit?
The page is trying to start another application. Do you want to continue?

Tiddloid is an app to work with locally stored TiddlyWikis. Once have some ideas, you can immediately write them down so that you can access them anywhere. For more details of TiddlyWiki, please see https://tiddlywiki.com/ .
 
 This app is released under GPL v2 license with the help of these open source projects:
 sardine-android - https://github.com/thegrizzlylabs/sardine-android ,
 sharp - https://github.com/Pixplicity/sharp ,
 License files provided with source codes.
 
 For more details about this app, please visit the project page ( https://github.com/donmor/Tiddloid/ ) or my homepage ( https://donmor.top/ ).
Tiddloid is published under GPL v2:
Tiddloid require these permissions to work properly:

[Internet Connection] 
For fetching remote templates 
[Writing External Storage] 
Optional, for processing file in legacy way 
[Camera] 
Optional, for probable plugins that use camera 
[Creating Shortcut] 
Optional, for creating shortcuts
To continue, you have to accept the agreements above.
